release_notes.en-US: NEW: Ported to Mailextensions for Thunderbird 78.

description.en-US: Do you accidentally resort your messages because your mouse click hits the message pane header instead of the top most message? Then No Message Pane Sorting is the addon you've been waiting for. It disables mouse buttons clicks on the message pane headers and your message list stays sorted all the time. But just in case you do need to resort your messages: You can still do it by ctrl-clicking or command-clicking on the header. Permissions: During installation, No Message Pane Sorting requests "full, unrestricted access to Thunderbird, and your computer". No Message Pane Sorting does not, in fact, accesses your files or anything on your computer outside of Thunderbird. This is an issue with porting addons to the new Thunderbird mail extensions. Since mail extensions currently don't support everything addons such as No Message Pane Sorting need (and were able to do in old versions of Thunderbird), addons need to implement so-called experiments. Any addon that implements an experiment gets full unrestricted access to the user's computer including file system access. This was already the case in earlier Thunderbird versions even though it wasn't spellt out like that. For more details see https://thunderbird.topicbox.com/groups/addons/Tc9a1303c15d0444d-M43d93470680298ba6c1f9aa0/permissions
description.de:
Sortierst Du unabsichtlich die Nachrichten in Mozilla Thunderbird um, weil Du den Tabellenkopf triffst und nicht oberste Email?

Dann ist No Message Pane Sort die Erweiterung, auf die Du gewartet hast. Das Addon unterdrückt Mausklicks auf den Tabellenkopf, so dass die Nachrichten so sortiert bleiben wie einmal eingestellt. Alle anderen Features, wie Umarrangieren der Spalten, funktionieren natürlich weiterhin.

Und solltest Du die Emails wirklich einmal umsortieren wollen, so kannst Du das weiterhin tun: Mit einem Klick auf den Spaltenkopf bei gedrückter Strg- bzw. Command-Taste.

developer_comments.en-US: I'd like to thank you for using this little addon. If you have questions, please, let me know.

name.de: No Message Pane Sort by Mouse

caption.en-US: Mouse clicks on the message pane headers are ignored which prevents accidental resorting.

summary.en-US:
No Message Pane Sort prevents accidental resorting of the message pane by disabling mouse button clicks on the column headers, thus, locking the sorting order of your emails.

It is still possible to sort messages by ctrl-clicking the header.
summary.de: No Message Pane Sort verhindert unabsichtliches Umsortieren der Nachrichten indem Mausklicks auf den Tabellenkopf deaktiviert werden.
